content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 2 open parentheses log subscript 3 x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="2 to the power of open parentheses 3 to the power of x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses 2 to the power of x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="2 times 3 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 times 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses 2 to the power of x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
